name: Find The Real Memory
description:
This is my first personal finished game with Unity. I am very proud of what I have made with the little time and skill I had to work with. Feedback is always welcome since there is a lot more I wish to add to it and update it.

As this project has been made for a Gam Jam, It had a few rules to follow. The main theme - Memories, and a restriction - the game must start and end as different genres. I did my best to make something that fits those ideas, and I think that in some way I managed.

The idea I ended up with: Our hero (a cube) has forgotten what is truly important for it. It goes around, collecting blank memories of things it created by viewing the world from a dark side. There is only one thing it can do to escape the fake memories. To find a real one. Even better, to find its brightest memory and face the darkness by itself.

Special thanks to my friend Snow for their amazing animations.

Enjoy!
